Crypterio is our view on the constantly growing ICO world. We’ve created and constantly update 3 useful lists: Active ICOs, Upcoming ICOs and Ended ICOs for everyone who is interested in ICOs and wants to stay current on the topic. The lists look like a kanban board (Inbox, In Progress, Done).

[/vc_column_text][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”10″ md_spacing=”10″ sm_spacing=”10″ xs_spacing=”10″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/12″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1515651250348{padding-top: 53px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1455871593995{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][stm_icon_box title_color=”custom” hide_title_line=”hide_title_line” enable_hexagon_animation=”enable” add_link=”enable” icon=”stm-btc_research” style=”icon_left” icon_size=”62″ icon_color=”third” icon_bg_color=”none” icon_width=”80″ link=”url:%2Fservices%2Fresearch-development%2F|||” title=”Research & Development” title_font_size=”22″ title_line_height=”26″ title_color_custom=”#ffffff”]Blockchain is revolutionizing our digital world and we want to transform the technology to innovation products.iii[/stm_icon_box][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][stm_icon_box title_color=”custom” hide_title_line=”hide_title_line” enable_hexagon_animation=”enable” add_link=”enable” icon=”stm-unicorn” style=”icon_left” icon_size=”62″ icon_color=”third” icon_bg_color=”none” icon_width=”80″ link=”url:%2Fservices%2Fico%2F|||” title=”Initial Coin Offering (ICO)” title_font_size=”22″ title_line_height=”26″ title_color_custom=”#ffffff”]Optimize your business case with blockchain technology. !important;}”][vc_tta_section title=”What is ICO” tab_id=”1522910492196-d8b801e0-fac8″][vc_column_text]An ICO (Initial Coin Offering or Token Sale) is a type of fundraising where in exchange for money (Bitcoin, Ethereum or fiat money) investors receive tokens (coins). Projects that launch an ICO promise an investor that tokens will have value and can be used after the ICO.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”What is PRE, Pre-sale, Pre-ICO” tab_id=”1522910520814-690b9370-3e33″][vc_column_text]An ICO (Initial Coin Offering or Token Sale) is a type of fundraising where in exchange for money (Bitcoin, Ethereum or fiat money) investors receive tokens (coins).
